Text:
The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing is an upcoming action-RPG  focusing on the trials of young Van Helsing, son of the legendary monster hunter. Set in a universe that closely resembles a 19th-century Eastern Europe where magic and weird technology is real, the story follows Van Helsing teaming up with his fathers ancient foes, the classic monsters to defeat the reign of the mad scientists.

Installation:
1> Unrar
2> Play!

i know for a fact the Beta ends at the locked door at the end of stage 1 because i had already played it. i want to know if it has been cracked yet.

settings can be changed in some of the Cfg files. like, is_preview_build=0 or 1 and other quest files you can change from inactive to active but none i have found so far that effect the door opening. how come no one gives a damn about this badass game? come on SCENE, fuck Riptide. get this bitch working.

I sure hope there's a way to get the full game unlocked. Downloading a 7GB file for one stage would kinda suck.

We'll just have to give it time, I suppose. I can wait.

point of posting it would be so people could try the early level of this badass game. mislabeling it the way "7" has is just leading people to believe it's the full game.
